long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save time with YouTube Quick Search, the must-have extension for seamless YouTube lookups! Instantly search any text you highlight on your browser with a single click. Whether you're researching, looking for music, or curious about trending topics, this extension connects you to YouTube faster than ever.

Features:

Highlight and Search: Highlight any text and search it directly on YouTube.
Quick Access: Right-click menu integration for fast YouTube searches.
No Distractions: Results open in a new tab without disrupting your browsing.
Perfect for students, music lovers, and anyone who loves discovering new content on the go!
